review_data.title: charming and fun
review_data.content: a great place to spend a day of relaxation. The water is colder than you think, nice staff, great for summer.

review_data.title: Great "to do"
review_data.content: This is one of the old (restored) Zurich bath houses. A gathering point for locals to go for a swim in the lake and hang out to enjoy the sun. It's a great "to do" in Zurich if you have never done it.
